pageProps.title: Columinate
pageProps.description: The “Wiser Living” initiative seeks to contribute to humanity’s cultural evolution by creating “deliberately developmental programs” – pathways for healthy human development articulated in integral, evolutionary curricula, trainings and content.

body.raw:
## Description

The “Wiser Living” initiative seeks to contribute to humanity’s cultural evolution by creating “deliberately developmental programs” – pathways for healthy human development articulated in integral, evolutionary curricula, trainings and content.
